generated_body: If you click on the article titled "LA Sweep: Angels' Trout, Dodgers' Bellinger win MVP Awards," you can expect a detailed overview of the recent MVP awards received by baseball players Mike Trout of the Los Angeles Angels and Cody Bellinger of the Los Angeles Dodgers.
